events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
An available agent has been assigned to handle the refund case.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the mistake with your order. I'll be happy to assist you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can process your refund quickly?
Here is my order number: 987654321 and attached a photo showing the incorrect product I got.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund and you should see the money back on your payment method within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate your help and look forward to the refund.
Your refund has been successfully processed. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
We are checking in to confirm you have received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution.
Your refund case has been closed as resolved. Thank you for contacting support.
